reviewText: If you can find this DVD, buy it asap!  I have only recently discovered Helmut Lotti and his voice and have loved every song that I have heard him sing. Besides the exemplary singing on this DVD and CD, the behind the scenes is a bonus and shows a little glimpse into Helmut, the man. He has a voice that makes me melt as well as a sense of humor and kindness. Take a listen and I am sure you will agree with me!
